configs.name: backend
configs.description: tests for the rest api of the backend

setup.cmd: docker-compose -f trest.docker-compose.yml build && docker-compose -f trest.docker-compose.yml up -d

tests.name: currency
retrieval of all currencies works
post of new currency returns 200
get single currency by id works
attempting to get single currency with non existant id returns 404

body_equals.error: specified item of type currency not found with filter id=5

tests.name: new currency created correctly
updating details of currency returns 200
updated currency details saved correctly
recipients
retrieval of all recipients works
post of new recipient returns 200
new recipient created correctly
get single recipient by id works
attempting to get single recipient with non existant id returns 404

body_equals.error: specified item of type recipient not found with filter id=5

tests.name: updating name of recipient returns 200
updated recipient name saved correctly
retrieval of all deep recipients returns expected output
accounts
retrieval of all accounts works
post of new account returns 200
new account created correctly
get single account by id works
attempting to get single account with non existant id returns 404

body_equals.error: specified item of type account not found with filter id=2

tests.name: updating details of account returns 200
updated account name saved correctly
retrieval of all deep accounts returns expected output
tags
retrieval of all tags works with no tags in the database
post of new tag returns 200
new tag created correctly
get single tag by id works
attempting to get single tag with non existant id returns 404

body_equals.error: specified item of type tag not found with filter id=5

tests.name: updating details of tag returns 200
updated tag name saved correctly
deleting tag returns 200
deleted tag doesnt get returned by get all anymore
post of another tag returns 200
second tag gets ID 1, even though tag with ID 0 got deleted
post of third tag returns 200
updating parent of tag returns 200
updated tag parent_id saved correctly
creating cyclic parent relationship fails

body_equals.error: the given item is invalid, because parent doesn't exist or would create a cyclic relationship

tests.name: deleting tag thats used as a parent returns 200
tag whose parent got deleted now has null as parent_id
creating tag with non existant parent fails

body_equals.error: the given item is invalid, because parent doesn't exist or would create a cyclic relationship

tests.name: updating tag with non existant parent fails

body_equals.error: the given item is invalid, because parent doesn't exist or would create a cyclic relationship

tests.name: retrieval of all deep tags returns expected output
users
login with wrong secret doesnt work
login with correct secret works
changing password returns 200
login with new secret works
login with old secret doesnt work

assets
retrieval of all assets works when none are created yet
post of new asset returns 200
new asset created correctly
get single asset by id works
attempting to get single asset with non existant id returns 404

body_equals.error: specified item of type asset not found with filter id=2

tests.name: updating details of asset returns 200
updated asset details saved correctly
post of second asset returns 200
deleting asset returns 200
correct asset got deleted
post of valuation returns 200
valuation got correctly saved
post of valuation with cost returns 200
valuation got correctly saved
no transactions created, because account_id wasnt specified
post of valuation with account_id returns 200
transaction gets correctly created
post of valuation with account_id and cost returns 200
transaction gets correctly created

body_equals.comment: Bought 10 units at 1.23€ each with additional cost of 1€

tests.name: post of valuation with account_id, cost and lower amount returns 200
transaction gets correctly created

body_equals.comment: Bought 10 units at 1.23€ each with additional cost of 1€
Sold 20 units at 1.23€ each with additional cost of 1€

tests.name: post of valuation with account_id, cost and amount_change returns 200
transaction gets correctly created

body_equals.comment: Bought 10 units at 1.23€ each with additional cost of 1€
Sold 20 units at 1.23€ each with additional cost of 1€
Bought 10 units at 1.23€ each with additional cost of 1€

tests.name: post of valuation with account_id, cost and negative amount_change returns 200
transaction gets correctly created

body_equals.comment: Bought 10 units at 1.23€ each with additional cost of 1€
Sold 20 units at 1.23€ each with additional cost of 1€
Bought 10 units at 1.23€ each with additional cost of 1€
Sold 10 units at 1.23€ each with additional cost of 1€
